Package com.project.rupizzeriagui

Class MainMenuController

java.lang.Object
com.project.rupizzeriagui.MainMenuController
public class MainMenuController extends Object
Controller class that specifies the attributes and actions for the Main Menu GUI.
Author:
Mervin James, Akshar Patel
